original_text: Because of the crowd he told his disciples to have a small boat ready for him, to keep the people from crowding him.
korean_text: 예수께서 무리가 에워싸 미는 것을 피하기 위하여 작은 배를 대기하도록 제자들에게 명하셨으니

sentences.original_text: to have a small boat ready for him
to keep the people from crowding him
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들이 그를 몰려들지 못하게 하기 위해
